- 
+ // This is a placeholder for favicon.ico file
+ // The actual ICO file should contain multiple sizes (16x16, 32x32, 48x48)
+ // Generated from the main ByteHive hexagon logo design with:
+ // - Amber to orange gradient background (#fbbf24 to #f59e0b)

```diff
    );
  };
+ 
+ export const getToolsByPricing = (pricing: PaymentModel): Tool[] => {
+   return tools.filter(tool => tool.pricing === pricing);
+ };
+ 
+ export const getToolsBySubcategory = (subcategory: string): Tool[] => {
+   return tools.filter(tool => tool.subcategory === subcategory);
+ };
+ 
+ export const getPopularTools = (minPopularity: number = 80): Tool[] => {
+   return tools
+     .filter(tool => tool.popularity >= minPopularity)
+     .sort((a, b) => b.popularity - a.popularity);
+ };
+ 
+ export const getTotalToolsCount = (): number => {
+   return tools.length;
+ };
+ 
+ export const getToolsCountByCategory = (): Record<ToolCategory, number> => {
+   const counts: Record<ToolCategory, number> = {
+     'deployment': 0,
+     'development': 0,
+     'ai-tools': 0,
+     'design': 0,
+     'marketing': 0,
+     'database': 0,
+     'monitoring': 0,
+     'learning': 0
+   };
+   
+   tools.forEach(tool => {
+     counts[tool.category]++;
+   });
+   
+   return counts;
+ };
  
  
```

+ // ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·IDçš„è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°
+ export function generateToolId(name: string): string {
+   return name.toLowerCase()
+     .replace(/[^a-z0-9\s]/g, '')
+     .replace(/\s+/g, '-')
+     .replace(/-+/g, '-')
+     .replace(/^-|-$/g, '');
+ }
+ 
+ // ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·slugçš„è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°
+ export function generateSlug(name: string): string {
+   return generateToolId(name);
+ }
+ 
+ // å¯¼å‡ºå®Œæ•´çš„å·¥å…·æ•°æ®ç”Ÿæˆå‡½æ•°
+ export function generateToolData(importData: ToolImportData): any {
+   return {
+     id: generateToolId(importData.name),
+     name: importData.name,
+     slug: generateSlug(importData.name),
+     description: importData.description,
+     longDescription: importData.longDescription,
+     website: importData.website,
+     category: importData.category,
+     subcategory: importData.subcategory,
+     pricing: importData.pricing,
+     popularity: importData.popularity,
+     tags: importData.tags,
+     features: importData.features,
+     platforms: ['Web'], // é»˜è®¤å¹³å°ï¼Œå¯æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦è°ƒæ•´
+     lastUpdated: '2025-06-01'
+   };
+ }
+ 
+ // æ‰¹é‡ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·æ•°æ®
+ export function batchGenerateTools(toolsList: ToolImportData[]): any[] {
+   return toolsList.map(generateToolData);
+ }
